languages.text: "Я Клеменциа Версериан, придворный канцлер династии фон Валанциус. От лица всего Даргонуса примите глубочайшие соболезнования по поводу безвременной кончины Теодоры фон Валанциус. Ее уход — ужасный удар для всех нас. Однако следом за угасшей звездой обязательно загорается новая. И, все еще преисполненные горечью и скорбью, ваши подданные надеются, что именно вы станете путеводным светом для торговой династии в столь нелегкие времена".

"I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."
languages.original_text: "Я Клеменциа Версериан, придворный канцлер династии фон Валанциус. От лица всего Даргонуса примите глубочайшие соболезнования по поводу безвременной кончины Теодоры фон Валанциус. Ее уход — ужасный удар для всех нас. Однако следом за угасшей звездой обязательно загорается новая. И, все еще преисполненные горечью и скорбью, ваши подданные надеются, что именно вы станете путеводным светом для торговой династии в столь нелегкие времена".

traits.locale_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always lights up. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

languages.text: “我是克莱门缇雅·韦尔森，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫廷宰相。我代表达戈努斯全体人民，对西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的不幸离世致以最深切的哀悼。她的离世对我们所有人而言，都是个可怕的打击。不过，当一颗星星消逝时，另一颗新星却会焕发生机。虽然前路依然充满了痛苦与悲伤，但在这艰难的日子里，您的臣民希望您能成为贸易王朝的指路明灯。”
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

traits.locale_text: “我是克莱门缇雅·韦尔森，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫廷宰相。我代表达戈努斯全体人民，对西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的不幸离世致以最深切的哀悼。她的离世对我们所有人而言，都是个可怕的打击。不过，当一颗星星消逝时，另一颗新星却会焕发生机。虽然前路依然充满了痛苦与悲伤，但在这艰难的日子里，您的臣民希望您能成为贸易王朝的指路明灯。”

languages.text: «Soy Clementia Werserian, canciller de la corte de la dinastía von Valancius. En nombre de todo Dargonus, permítame que exprese mi más sentido pésame por la prematura muerte de Theodora von Valancius. Es una gran pérdida para todos. Pero cuando una estrella muere, otra ocupa su lugar. Y, aunque siguen abrumados por la amargura y el dolor, sus súbditos esperan que se convierta en la luz guía de la dinastía en estos momentos tan difíciles».
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

traits.locale_text: «Soy Clementia Werserian, canciller de la corte de la dinastía von Valancius. En nombre de todo Dargonus, permítame que exprese mi más sentido pésame por la prematura muerte de Theodora von Valancius. Es una gran pérdida para todos. Pero cuando una estrella muere, otra ocupa su lugar. Y, aunque siguen abrumados por la amargura y el dolor, sus súbditos esperan que se convierta en la luz guía de la dinastía en estos momentos tan difíciles».

languages.text: 「私はクレメンティア・ウェルザリアン、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の宮殿議長です。ダルゴナス全土を代表し、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の早逝に深い哀悼の意を表します。彼女の逝去はすべての者に大きな悲しみを残しました。しかし、ひとつの星が落ちれば別の星が光り輝くもの。臣下たちもまだ苦渋と悲しみに打ちひしがれていますが、この困難な時代において御身が貿易王朝を導いてくださることを願っています」
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

traits.locale_text: 「私はクレメンティア・ウェルザリアン、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の宮殿議長です。ダルゴナス全土を代表し、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の早逝に深い哀悼の意を表します。彼女の逝去はすべての者に大きな悲しみを残しました。しかし、ひとつの星が落ちれば別の星が光り輝くもの。臣下たちもまだ苦渋と悲しみに打ちひしがれていますが、この困難な時代において御身が貿易王朝を導いてくださることを願っています」

languages.text: "Ich bin Clementia Werserian, Hofkanzlerin der Dynastie von Valancius. Im Namen von ganz Dargonus möchte ich Euch mein tiefstes Beileid für das vorzeitige Ableben von Theodora von Valancius aussprechen. Ihr Verlust ist ein schrecklicher Schlag für uns alle. Aber wenn ein Stern vergeht, entflammt stets ein anderer zum Leben. Und trotz aller Trauer hoffen Eure Untertanen, dass Ihr in diesen schweren Zeiten zum Licht der Handelsdynastie werdet und uns alle leitet."
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

Im Namen von ganz Dargonus möchte ich Euch mein tiefstes Beileid für das vorzeitige Ableben von Theodora von Valancius aussprechen. Ihr Verlust ist ein schrecklicher Schlag für uns alle. Aber wenn ein Stern vergeht, entflammt stets ein anderer zum Leben. Und trotz aller Trauer hoffen Eure Untertanen, dass Ihr in diesen schweren Zeiten zum Licht der Handelsdynastie werdet und uns alle leitet."

languages.text: « Je suis Clémentia Werserian, chancelière de la cour de la dynastie von Valancius. Au nom de Dargonus, veuillez accepter nos plus sincères condoléances pour le décès de Théodora von Valancius. Sa mort prématurée est une véritable tragédie. Mais lorsqu'une étoile s'éteint, une autre se met à briller, et vos sujets, bien que dévastés par le chagrin, espèrent que votre lumière les guidera vers la prospérité en ces temps difficiles. »
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis Clémentia Werserian, chancelière de la cour de la dynastie von Valancius. Au nom de Dargonus, veuillez accepter nos plus sincères condoléances pour le décès de Théodora von Valancius. Sa mort prématurée est une véritable tragédie. Mais lorsqu'une étoile s'éteint, une autre se met à briller, et vos sujets, bien que dévastés par le chagrin, espèrent que votre lumière les guidera vers la prospérité en ces temps difficiles. »

languages.text: "Bendeniz Clementia Werserian, von Valancius hanedanlığının saray şansölyesiyim. Tüm Dargonus adına lütfen Theodora von Valancius'un zamansız vefatı için en derin taziyelerimi iletmeme izin verin. Ölümü hepimiz için çok ağır bir darbe lakin bir yıldız kayıp giderken bir diğeri alevlenip hayat bulur. Her ne kadar hâlâ acı ve matem içindeysek de tebaanız olarak bu zorlu zamanlarda ticaret hanedanlığının yol gösterici ışığı olacağınızı umuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "I am Clementia Werserian, court chancellor of the von Valancius dynasty. On behalf of all of Dargonus, please accept my deepest condolences on the untimely passing of Theodora von Valancius. Her departure is a terrible blow to us all. But as one star expires, another always flares to life. And, although still overcome with bitterness and grief, your subjects hope that you will become the trade dynasty's guiding light in these trying times."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Clementia Werserian, von Valancius hanedanlığının saray şansölyesi. Tüm Dargonus adına lütfen Theodora von Valancius'un zamansız vefatı için en derin taziyelerimi iletmeme izin verin. Ölümü hepimiz için çok ağır bir darbe ancak bir yıldız kayıp giderken bir diğeri alevlenip hayat bulur. Her ne kadar hâlâ acı ve matem içindeysek de, tebaalarınız olarak bu zorlu zamanlarda ticaret hanedanlığının yol gösterici ışığı olacağınızı umuyoruz."
